review: How can you not love this thing?? Especially if your a prime member this rocks. We cut out cable a year ago and yse only the fire tvz and a firestick in bedrooms. Can not complain. review: I had to replace the first one because it was always HOT on the bottom.It works pretty good, my biggest complaint is that the auto-shutoff takes hours, and that it is honestly easier to read the program descriptions on Amazon Prime while using the Roku 3!The Amazon Fire also does a horrible job at letting me know which eppisodes that I've already watched, which can be very frustrating.I expected more, but it is worth having on one of my TVs. I still wouldn't give up my Roku for this though!
